_sText:
This map was created by Furchee.

Things included in the map :

Disco with animated dance floor, DJ room and 7 different songs to choose from and a massive discoball.
Football field.
1 Secret Room.
Isolation Room.
Shower Room.
Pool Room.
Cage.
Armory (contains M4A1, Ak47, Deagle, Scout, AWP,XM-1014, Hegrenades, Smokegrenades and Flashbangs.)
The classic electric chair !
Fixed a bit of lighting.
Detailed medic !

Update #2 :
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fixed Textures.
Added a teleport out of the secret room
Fixed the Discoball.
Reduced lagg caused by Disco ball.
Disco ball now stoppable.
Made the armory bigger.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Update #3 :
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Complete RE-EDIT.
New T spawn ^..^
Soccer is now outside with ball set to less mass.
Disco now has it's control panel above the disco room (only one person can enter). New way to get into the secret room.
Extended Cage.
Fixed electric chair (now kills you no matter where in the room).
Garden outside.
Disco ball can be toggled to cause less fps use.
Better fps =3
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Hope you guys like it !

~Furchee
